text: ==Cities by prefecture== ===Aichi=== * Takahama ** City of Kawara (roof tiles) * Toyota, Nagoya ** Castle Town of Toyota * Yatomi ** City of Goldfish ===Akita=== ===Aomori=== ===Chiba=== title: List of city nicknames in Japan
